fr.dudie.nominatim.client.request

Class NominatimRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.dudie.nominatim.client.request.NominatimRequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoordinatesReverseQuery, ExtendedSearchQuery, NominatimLookupRequest, NominatimReverseRequest, NominatimSearchRequest, OsmTypeAndIdLookupQuery, OsmTypeAndIdReverseQuery, SimpleSearchQuery

    public abstract class NominatimRequest
extends Object
    Classes extending this should be able to build URL query string parts to append to nominatim server URL to make requests. Uses QueryParameter annotations to describe the query parameters.
    Author:
    Jeremie Huchet

    • Constructor Detail

      • NominatimRequest

        public NominatimRequest()

    • Method Detail

      • getQueryString

        public final String getQueryString()
        Generates the query string to be sent to nominatim to execute a request.

        The query string must have URL encoded parameters.

        example: q=some%20city&polygon_geojson=1

        Returns:
        a query string
